files.name: main.py
files.content:
# Shand, Molly - Mid Term Program

print ("Planet Express Delivery Time Calculator")
print (" ")

planetName = input ("What is the name of the planet?")
parsecs = float (input ("How many parsecs away?"))
packages = float (input ("How many packages?"))
packageWeight = float (input ("How many tons does each package weigh?"))

print (" ")

if (packages < 1):
    print ("Error: The ship must carry at least one package.")
    
elif (packageWeight <= 0):
    print ("Error: The package weight", packageWeight, "is too light.")
    
elif (parsecs < 1): 
    print ("Error:", planetName, "must be one or more parsecs away.")
    
elif (packages > 10 and packages % 2 > 0):
    print ("Warning: Adjusting package count to", packages + 1)
    packages = packages + 1 

while (packages > 10 and packages % 2 > 0):
    print ("Warning: Adjusting package count to", packages + 1)
    packages = packages + 1 
    
            
else:
    tonsOfcargo = (packages * packageWeight)
    print ("The total cargo weight is", tonsOfcargo, "ton(s).")
    tripTo = ((tonsOfcargo * parsecs) + parsecs)
    print ("The trip to", planetName, "will take", tripTo, "minutes.")
    tripBack = parsecs
    print ("The trip back to Earth will take", tripBack, "minutes.")
    roundTrip = (tripTo + tripBack)
    print ("The total trip time is", roundTrip, "minutes.")
        
if (planetName == "Robot Planet"):
    print ("Also, Bender is great!")
